mapper.select: SELECT t.customerno "customerno", t.certificateno "loginname", t1.PASSWORD "password" FROM cas.cust t INNER JOIN cas.aus_authone t1 ON t.customerno = t1.customerno WHERE t.certificateno = #{loginname}

SELECT t.customerno "customerno", t.mobile "loginname", t1.PASSWORD "password" FROM cas.cust t INNER JOIN cas.aus_authone t1 ON t.customerno = t1.customerno WHERE t.mobile = #{loginname} and t.membertype='0'
SELECT t.customerno "customerno", t.loginname "loginname", t1.PASSWORD "password" FROM cas.employee t INNER JOIN cas.aus_authone t1 ON t.customerno = t1.customerno WHERE t.loginname =#{loginname}

select dict_id "dictId", dict_name "dictName", dict_key "dictKey", dict_value "dictValue" from kpfsp.sys_dict where
dict_id = #{item.dictId} and dict_key = #{item.dictKey}
